segments.text: I'd like to buy a tie to match this suit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have various colors . How about this one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the color is all right . But it looks outdated.Can you show me that one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have a very good taste . It's our best seller .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ! Look , it suits you well .
segments.speaker: S1
